survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Hybrid Workspace Solutions Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees about their satisfaction and preferences regarding hybrid workspace solutions implemented by the company.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current hybrid workspace solutions provided by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly display.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current hybrid workspace solutions provided by your employer?

questions.question_text: Which of the following hybrid workspace solutions do you currently use? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Remote work stipend for home office setup
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Ensure options are clear and concise.

script.question_text: Which of the following hybrid workspace solutions do you currently use? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Remote work stipend for home office setup

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the hybrid workspace solutions?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the hybrid workspace solutions?

questions.question_text: How often do you utilize the on-site workspace in a typical week?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question. Ensure options cover all possible frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you utilize the on-site workspace in a typical week?

questions.question_text: What challenges do you face with the current hybrid workspace solutions? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Lack of adequate home office equipment
Difficulty collaborating with remote team members
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice) with optional open-text for 'Other'.

answer_options: Lack of adequate home office equipment
